page.title: 19COMMUNITY LIFE
page.content: Community life is mainly centred on three buildings, the{Village Hall,}the {School}and the{Methodist schoolroom, which are all used by various organisations.The Village Hall is run by a committee which includes representatives from local organisations.As it has an entertainments licence it is the most widely used building.Dances, whistdrives,concerts etc. are held there and the{Guides, Brownies}and {Senior Citizens Club}are among the organisations using it. The Methodist schoolroom is used by the{playgoup among others. The school is mostly used for school functions or by the thriving{P.T.A.}There is a{Youth Club, but that is held at another venue which is more central to the area covered.
